{{For|other uses|Effect (disambiguation)}}

'''Effect colors''' refer to the combined concepts of [[color]]s applied to [[Item colors|items]] and [[particle]]s which are linked to [[potion]]s and [[effect]]s.

A comparison of old and new potion colors can be found [[Effect colors/Java Edition potion color changes in 1.19.4|here]].

== Old colors ==
{{Removed feature|section=1|Potion colors were changed shortly before the Trails & Tales update on ''Java Edition'' and ''Bedrock Edition''. Legacy Console Edition and ''New Nintendo 3DS Edition'' still use old potion colors alongside older versions of ''Java Edition'' and ''Bedrock Edition''.}}
{{missing information|section|any different non-potion effect code values used on ''Bedrock Edition'', and if there are any, any version exclusive potion and effect colors on ''New Nintendo 3DS Edition'' and Legacy Console Edition}}

This section displays the potion and effect colors on ''[[Java Edition]]'' and ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' before the [[Trails & Tales]] update. This also includes the Legacy Console Edition and ''New Nintendo 3DS Edition''.

IDs listed are that of the numerical effect IDs, N/A is listed for colors used only for potions, or version exclusives.<!---

The Java Edition values were taken from the codebase of Java Edition 1.17.1 and 1.12.2; except Potion of Turtle Master, which was screenshotted in inventory in Java Edition 1.14.4, and also compared with arrow of turtle master screenshot texture in Java 1.19.2. Darkness effect value from 1.19.2 codebase.

The textures of tipped arrows (water bottles not compared) on Bedrock 1.17.41 and Bedrock 1.9.x, were analyzed to get the potion colors, but not effect colors, effect colors were not analyzed and need to be analyzed. 

Water bottle textures on Bedrock 1.9.x and 1.17.41 were compared with Java 1.12.2 and Java 1.17.1 water bottle textures, and the 1.9.x BE and 1.12.2 JE texture matched directly, but 1.17.41 BE and 1.17.1 JE wasn't be compared.

Java Edition 1.19.3 was not checked, the value was pulled from the Minecraft Wiki page revision prior to Nov. 2022--->
